name: Montana
message:
Ey Conjo! 
"All I have in this world is my balls and my word, and I don't break 'em for no one!" ...

name: Lee
message: I fear not the man who has practiced 10,000 kicks once, but I fear the man who has practiced one kick 10,000 times.

name: Smith
message: “Human beings are a disease, cancer of this planet.”

name: The Wiseman
message: . "You take the red pill - you stay in wonderland, and I show you how deep the rabbit hole goes."

name: The Hero
message: “I’ll show these people what you don’t want them to see. A world without rules and controls, without borders or boundaries. A world where anything is possible.”

name: Vincent
message:
- Vincent: 
“Aw, man, I shot Marvin in the face.”

- Jules: 
“Say ‘what’ again. Say ‘what’ again. I dare you. I double-dare you, motherfucker, say ‘what’ one more goddamn time!”
